Calculate Salt Balance

Source: R/SaltBalance.R
SaltBalance.Rd

This function calculates the salt balance based on dry sample mass, water amount, and ion concentrations.

Usage

SaltBalance(m_s, V_w, conc)

Source

https://zenodo.org/records/6280617#.Yic0yKvMJjE

Arguments

m_s

Numeric. Dry Sample Mass, m_s (g)

V_w

Numeric. Amount of water added to sample for IC, V_w (ml)

conc

Data frame. Raw Ion Chromatography Data (IC) (mg L^(-1)) containing the following columns:

  • chloride: Chloride (Cl-) Concentration

  • nitrate: Nitrate (NO3-) Concentration

  • sulfate: Sulfate (SO42-) Concentration

  • sodium: Sodium (Na+) Concentration

  • potassium: Potassium (K+) Concentration

  • calcium: Calcium (Ca2+) Concentration

  • magnesium: Magnesium (Mg2+) Concentration

Value

A list containing:

pathway

The selected pathway (I or II)

cat.adj

Adjusted cations

x_adj

Adjusted mole fractions

w_f

Final weight fractions

w_eval

A data frame with evaluation metrics
